TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualFile extends System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFileBase
Public MustInherit Class VirtualFile Inherits VirtualFileBase
public ref class VirtualFile abstract : System::Web::Hosting::VirtualFileBase

summary.span: 表示虚拟文件或资源空间中的一个文件对象。

span.span: Represents a file object in a virtual file or resource space.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类是表示虚拟文件系统中的文件的对象的基类。The class is the base class for objects that represent files in a virtual file system. 通常, 将为 Web 应用程序中的每个对象子代实现类的子代。Typically, you would implement a descendent of the class for each object descendent in your Web application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个类实现, 它将存储在对象中的信息与模板文件组合在一起以返回 HTML 数据。The following code example is a class implementation that combines information stored in a object with a template file to return HTML data. 此代码示例使用和类的代码示例, 以从加载到对象的数据存储区中提供虚拟资源。This code example works with the code examples for the and classes to provide virtual resources from a data store that is loaded into a object. 有关编译和运行该示例的完整说明, 请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分。For the complete instructions for compiling and running the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此示例包含三个部分: 类实现、用于填充对象的 XML 数据文件以及页模板文件。This example has three parts: the class implementation, an XML data file used to populate the object, and the page template file. 第一个代码示例是类的实现。The first code example is an implementation of the class. 其构造函数使用自定义对象的方法来返回对象。Its constructor uses a method on a custom object to return a object. 然后, 它搜索对象以检索与提供的虚拟文件路径相关联的信息。It then searches the object to retrieve the information associated with the virtual file path provided. 在方法中, 它将对象中的信息与模板文件组合在一起, 并以对象的形式返回组合。 In the method, it combines the information from the object with a template file and returns the combination as a object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SampleVirtualFile.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SampleVirtualFile.vb#40)] 第二个示例是用于填充自定义 对象返回的对象的 XML 数据文件。The second example is the XML data file used to populate the object returned by the custom object. 此 XML 数据用于演示如何使用、 和类从外部数据中检索数据, 而不用于表示生产质量的数据存储区。This XML data is used to demonstrate using the , , and classes to retrieve data from external data, and is not intended to represent a production-quality data store. ``` ``` 第三个示例是用作虚拟文件模板的文本文件。The third example is the text file used as a template for the virtual file. 文件中的占位符用百分比 (%)标记, 例如`%file%`和`%content%`。Placeholders in the file are represented by text between percent (%) marks, such as `%file%` and `%content%`. 时间戳用于监视对缓存的虚拟文件数据的更改。Timestamps are used to monitor changes to cached virtual file data. ``` File name: %file%

%file%

%content%

Page timestamp: %pageTimestamp%
Data timestamp: %dataTimestamp%
Template timestamp: %templateTimestamp%

```

para.span: 从类继承时, 必须重写方法, 以将只读流返回到虚拟资源的内容。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you must override the method to return a read-only stream to the contents of the virtual resource.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string virtualPath) cil managed

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 此实例所表示资源的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to the resource represented by this instance.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个构造函数的实现, 它从自定义对象提供的对象中检索虚拟文件信息。The following code example is an implementation of the constructor that retrieves virtual file information from a object provided by a custom object. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SampleVirtualFile.cs#41)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SampleVirtualFile.vb#41)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsDirectory As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsDirectory { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示该资源是应作为文件处理的虚拟资源。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that this is a virtual resource that should be treated as a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream Open() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Open () As Stream

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回到虚拟资源的只读流。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a read-only stream to the virtual resource.
A read-only stream to the virtual file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个流, 其中包含由类视为文件的数据。 The method returns a stream containing the data treated as a file by the class. 流是只读的, 并且是可查找的 ( 属性为 true)。The stream is read-only and is seekable (the property is true). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是方法的实现, 该方法将虚拟文件特定的信息与模板文件合并, 然后返回组合。The following code example is an implementation of the method that combines virtual-file-specific information with a template file and then returns the combination. 缓存模板文件以减少多次读取文件系统以检索模板文件的开销。The template file is cached to reduce the overhead of reading the file system multiple times to retrieve the template file. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SampleVirtualFile.cs#42)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SampleVirtualFile.vb#42)]

para.span: 在派生类中 , 方法必须返回一个查找的流。

span.span: In derived classes the method must return a seekable stream.

para.span: 如果该方法返回的流不支持查找, 则当流传递到对象以写出数据时, 将引发。

span.span: If the method returns a stream that does not support seeking, a is thrown when the stream is passed to the object to write out the data.

para.span: 发生此异常的原因是响应尝试读取属性, 但在无法查找的流上, 尝试访问该属性将导致异常。

span.span: The exception occurs because the response tries to read the property, and on a stream that is not seekable, attempting to access the property causes an exception.

para.span: 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。

span.span: For more information, see the property.
